ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “I'll tell you one thing, rookie.
This desert is
extremely dangerous.”{PAUSE}“It'll welcome you in,
but when you try
to leave, it'll swallow ya.”{PAUSE}“I hear some of them
never make it out…
the best thing is to stay
out of the desert entirely.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “This elevator will
take you to the top…”{PAUSE}“But, you gotta be picked
as a Chocobo Racer, first.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “You thinkin' of livin' here forever?
Then live a long life!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // “Those guys only tell lies.
Only lies. Not one of 'em
will tell you the truth.{PAUSE}“Just talk with 'em a couple of times,
and you'll get sick of 'em.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:14}); // “Man with a gun on his arm?”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // “You wanna see the Boss?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // “Go Southwest
and you'll meet him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // “Once out in the desert,
stay still and
don't walk.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // “There's no way you'll ever see
a mysterious Chocobo carriage.
No way.”

dialogStrings: Corel Prison

“You new?
Then go and pay your
respects to Mr. Coates.”

“More respects again?
You sure are formal, go ahead…”

“I'll tell you one thing, rookie.
This desert is
extremely dangerous.”{PAUSE}“It'll welcome you in,
but when you try
to leave, it'll swallow ya.”{PAUSE}“I hear some of them
never make it out…
the best thing is to stay
out of the desert entirely.”

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
“Ha ha ha”

“This elevator will
take you to the top…”{PAUSE}“But, you gotta be picked
as a Chocobo Racer, first.”

“Want to enter the Chocobo Race?”
{CHOICE}Not interested
{CHOICE}Yeah, I want to enter

“You thinkin' of livin' here forever?
Then live a long life!”

“Then go get permission
with the boss of this place.”

{Cloud}
“Who's the boss?”

“You don't even know that?
Oh man.”
“Empty…”
“This place is heaven.”
“Man with a gun on his arm?”
“Never heard of him.”
“You wanna see the Boss?”

“Go Southwest
and you'll meet him.”
“You'll meet him.”

“Once out in the desert,
stay still and
don't walk.”
“Don't walk.”

“There's no way you'll ever see
a mysterious Chocobo carriage.
No way.”
“No way.”

“Those guys only tell lies.
Only lies. Not one of 'em
will tell you the truth.{PAUSE}“Just talk with 'em a couple of times,
and you'll get sick of 'em.”
